meanings: There is no need to say

vlive.korean: 지금 와서 말하지만 난 약간 지금 와서 서운한 거 있어 - 뭔데? Now I can talk about it. It was a bit disappointing. - What's that? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : From 😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍
vlive.english: Now I can talk about it. It was a bit disappointing. - What's that?

vlive.korean: [이렇게 말하지만 젓가락은 절대 놓지 않음] 우리 진짜 먹고 있어서 집중을 못 하는 건가? 뭐지? [But he still has chopsticks in his hand] Is it because we're distracted by food? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [늉포차] “안주를 향한 저세상 텐션“ (NU'EST)
vlive.english: [But he still has chopsticks in his hand] Is it because we're distracted by food?

vlive.korean: (다시 말하지만) 아니야 나 요즘 많이 안 잤어... No, I didn't sleep a lot these days... 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] 이곳은 가평💜
vlive.english: No, I didn't sleep a lot these days...

vlive.korean: [다시 말하지만 시크릿 산타 찍기 전] 아 그게 떡밥인가요? [It's all before the secret Santa episode] Is it an unresolved issue? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.27 세봉이의 상상은 현실이 된다 #1
vlive.english: [It's all before the secret Santa episode] Is it an unresolved issue?

vlive.korean: 다시 한 번 말하지만 조수가 피를 흘리면 뭐다? Let me remind you, what does it mean when the assistant bleeds while helping with the graduation exhibition? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 내 운명이라는 남자가 날 쌩깠다 [나의 이름에게] - EP.01
vlive.english: Let me remind you, what does it mean when the assistant bleeds while helping with the graduation exhibition?

examples.korean: I am not, repeat not, travelling in the same car as him! 발음듣기 나는 절대, 다시 말하지만 절대, 그와 같은 차를 타고 가지 않을 거야! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I am not, repeat not, travelling in the same car as him! 발음

examples.korean: He always says he’ll help but when it comes to the crunch he does nothing. 발음듣기 그는 항상 도와주겠다고 말하지만 중대 상황이 발생하면 아무것도 하지 않는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He always says he’ll help but when it comes to the crunch he does nothing. 발음

examples.korean: He says he doesn’t care about what the critics write, but I know different. 발음듣기 그는 평론가들이 뭐라고 쓰든 상관 안 한다고 말하지만 내가 알기론 그렇지 않다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He says he doesn’t care about what the critics write, but I know different. 발음

examples.korean: People say that life is the thing, but I prefer reading. (Logan Pearsall Smith) 발음듣기 사람들은 인생이 모든 것이라고 말하지만 나는 독서가 좋다. (로건 피어설 스미스, 독서명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: People say that life is the thing, but I prefer reading. (Logan Pearsall Smith) 발음

examples.korean: I will say it again, Ilysm. 발음듣기 다시 말하지만, 사랑해. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: I will say it again, Ilysm. 발음
